title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.12? Click Here!
body:
*Hey all,*

*Patch 5.12 has dropped! If you've tried to launch League and hit an issue, the solutions below should get this fixed and allow you to patch!*

-----------------------------------------

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: I can't really even play league after this update. Every few minutes I'm hit with "attempting to reconnect" in the middle of a game for about 30-40 seconds at a time. I've also had the client crash on me in the midde of loading into a game, which has caused leaverbuster to penelize me for the same issue a third time even when I reconnected to the game. I've checked my ISP, everything else is running including streamed music. I'd really like to get the connectivity resolved. I would also like to know if there is a way I can get the leaver buster punishment removed so I don't have to wait 20 minutes before I can play over things that were out of my control.

Same problem, since patch keep getting attempting to reconnect soon after joining a game, also major lag through out any of my games. Perfectly fine before this patch. Ive ran repair twice and reinstalled twice.

Exact same here, have low priority queue but cant even get into a custom game since this patch, hopefully someone at riot will see this and fix whatever it is because being able to join a single game because of riot's coding and getting penalized is just shit

Since this patch I havent been able to play a sinlge game, not even custom games. as soon as it try to loads i get a blank screen and this appears "<ahref="https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664"target="_blank"><u>check your network connection </u<>/a>   "   but ive now been penalised for these crashes so if you could look into it and get it fixed that would be great, the patch just broke the game for many not just me
I'm having this exact same issue in NA
same thing and this is getting really annoying!

Have you tried the Connection Troubleshooting Guide yet, to help resolve your problem? You can find that [guide here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). The steps in it fix almost every connection problem you can have. I would recommend testing all the changes you make with Custom games, so that you don't get penalized by LeaverBuster.
I cant connect to any game and get the black screen and i tried repairing the game and reinstalling.
Did you ever get resolution for this problem? I'm running out of alternative accounts to jump on.

After this patch, the game is literally unplayable for me. I'm doing ARAMs now because theres no way I can ranked. I keep disconnecting in the ARAMs, Im fine for 5 mins if that, then I start getting extremely high ping to the point its unplayable. Then, I get the trying to reconnect bs and it won't reconnect so I have to close out of LoL and then try and reopen it, sometimes it connects sometimes it doesn't, only to have to deal with the same crap AGAIN. This is literally the first time I've had to deal with this problem and its right after THIS patch. Anyone have a fix?
I'm only getting 12 kbps download speed on this patch.

ARE YOU FREAKING KIDDING ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!      I was in a Normal game, my wifi and my ping + fps Is Super normal, but suddenly MY gAME POP Out A "Attempting to reconnect", so i wait for 3 minute and i quit the game to Restart my game, i thought it was a game crash and in the warning it say your game had crashed, But I WAS WAITING IN THE LOADING SCREAN FOR 10 MINUTE! i restart my computer and repair Me LEAGUE OF LEGEND PATCHER,  I LOGED IN BUT I CAN'T RECONNECT IN TO THE LOADING SCREAN,  I WAIT AND WAIT, AND THE GAME END, AND THE ****"FREAKING STUPID LEAVEBUSTER"** ** GAVE ME A FREAKING WARNING, WHAT THE F* HAPPEN TO MY GAME .

My huge issue is that after this patch, later the same night, my ping suddenly  skyrocketed to 456. A solid 456. It stayed that way for the rest of the night and I lost a game for it. I'm not the only one having the issue. Right now it seems to be random but also consistent in terms of ISP to location (i.e. I live in Florida and have AT&T  where so does my friend and he got the same issue as did my other friend). There have been posts in the help and support section but seems like no reply. I'd really like to know what's going on. Now if I go in game my ping has a random chance of hitting 200+. It was perfectly fine before. I did everything on that Connection Issues Guide. Port forwarded, was already on wired, etc etc. Any idea Riot?
It gets hung up on "Calculating Differences : 2 Files Scanned" then BugSplat shows up

Any time that you receive a Bug Splat with League typically indicates some type of odd hardware/software interaction.  Make sure to take some time to complete the steps in our [Bug Splat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)!  It has some common steps that usually squash (ha HA!) this bug error.

Reply back if it hasn't seemed to help!

So Specifically, the bugSplat doesn't occur during this phase actually. I even watched the Patch video while waiting for it to update, with no movement of it updating. I then tried to "Repair" the patcher using your feature and it goes to Bug Splat.

I'm having similar issues, my patcher gets stuck at "Calculating Differences : ## Files Scanned" and eventually says there's an usual error (I don't remember the exact wording) and then a BugSplat Error Report pops up. I worked through all the solutions in 'Troubleshooting Connection Issues' and 'Bug Splat and Game Crashes' to no avail. Just like Duckzilla, trying the 'Repair' option in the patcher gives a Bug Splat error.

I have been trying to solve this problem for at least 6 hours now and am extremely frustrated and fed up. Do you have any other suggestions?

I can't play either, after the champ select the screen just goes black. Then i get sent into the reconnect page and i click reconnect and the same thing just happens over and over again. Until finally somehow I manage to get in the game. I try another and the same thing happens it waste like 15 minutes.

I work in an Internet Cafe, and ALWAYS a new patch comes out, majority of the players always receive ATTEMPTING RECONNECT. It always happens like this until several weeks pass by, then its completely fine. I get BLAMED that their accounts gets LEAVER BUSTER when it's always a new patch doing this. Why?

LEAGUE OF LEGENDS WHY U HATE ME SO.... Iv tried everything on this form twice and still cant get league to open after the launcher. I have reinstalled league 5 times, used the repair button 7, run the program through windows 7, admin, not admin, lol admin launcher and nothing is working please HELP!!!

Hey TheBean of Chaos!

What specific problem are you having? The more information we have, the better we can help you!
After i click launch in the updater nothing happens. my mouse sometimes does the loading circle thing but then just stops and the login page never opens

I'm having the same issue that a few others are - which is the download is creeping extremely slow.  After about 2 hours I was at 16% and decided to restart it.  My program does run as admin,** and after using the "Repair Client" tool ** the update flew thru in a few minutes and was able to be installed.  Hopefully this will help some others!

Awesome!  :D

Solid advice!
Riot never even responded to my last post. This patch murdered the the game. Let me play the game again or refund my purchases.
Im literally in a game right now and it absolutely wont connect to the server after champion select

Hi, so I've been trying to download this new patch for 3 hours now and it's hit a max of 27 KBps but it goes from 27 down to 0, sits there for a while and goes back. It's not an internet problem. Anything I can do to speed this up?

This issue may be happening because the game lacks the proper permissions to replace your older patch files with the newer patch files. You may be able to remedy this by running the game in [Administrator mode](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434#wq4).

Feel free to reply to this if you're still experiencing these problems!

This doesn't work for me. I've left this to download for ages and the farthest it gets is 1%. Nothing has worked, and my support ticket hasn't been replied to again yet. What can I do? It goes down to 0kbs almost immediately when updating interface and it's not an internet problem.

If it only gets to 1%, then there may be a greater issue here with your Computers Permissions.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to get access to files found on your harddrive, but Windows is not allowing it to happen.  Try the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), and see if it helps!

Let us know!
I started downloading as administrator and it fixed the speed issue. If anyone else is having the problem try this and it will probably fix it.

I've uninstalled and reinstalled, deleted various files that support has told me to do, and restarted my computer and no matter what I do, the patcher gets to around 75% and then gets to 0 KBps. After that an error message will come up, although now it just closes completely with a system message that says that a the program failed to create a dump file. Its been like 2 days and all I want to do is play the IP boost weekend {{item:3073}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3073}}

First attempt failed at 33%.
I closed it and was greeted with a bugsplat message.

Second attempt failed at 99%.
I closed it and was again greeted with a bugsplat message.

Third attempt succeeded.

i mean no big deal, but that's how it has been for me for the last 3 patches.

At least you fixed the login bug that had us login twice ore even more often, **Thanks for that!**
i can live with this patcher bug!

> [{quoted}](name=Aerothal,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1ynwPhQ0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-24T19:21:11.373+0000)
>

> i can live with this patcher bug!

You can but it's completely impossible for some to play the game now. It's like they've selectively chosen who can and who can't download their game and there isn't jack shit we can do about it on our end. Literally none of the solutions work and riot isn't responding to the many threads about it.

Ever since patch 5.11 it will never fully update. Every single time I try to do so it gets stuck at 277 mb left and 0 kbps. The percentage slowly goes up but usually at 56% it stops going up. The best it's ever gotten was about 75 % then it wouldn't budge for hours. My computer also usually freezes at about 50% and I have to do a hard shutdown because everything is unresponsive.  It's only officially crashed twice and showed up with bugsplat.  I've repaired, ran as an admin, forced a repatch and I still haven't gotten any results. Any advice?

The BugSplat errors do seem kind of troubling...have you had a chance to complete all of the steps in our [BugSplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)?  If we can get these BugSplat errors resolved, we may be able to narrow down what the root cause can be!

Im having the same issue as FelixNetherPony. Ive tried the entire bug splat guide, as well as the Connection Issues guide andr nothing has improved. Sometimes it continuously applies patches and sometimes it get stuck at 277mb remaining (56%). I have uninstalled and reinstalled several times, when i try to repair it either continuously scans files or just goes straight to bug splat. I have literally tried every option the forum has provided and not one improvement has been made. And ive been going at this for like 17 hours... - just trying to update and coming back to it-. Also a thing to note, when i open the lol client and it tries to complete the patch, it completely stops my internet speed. Like i can no longer browse or anything until i close the patcher. I switched to a wired connection and am still experiencing the same issues.

i usually get this problem and reinstall and its fine, but this time i reinstalled.. it took 4 hours, i logged in then logged out couse i had too do some stuff, i started up my pc and open league of legends and it was stuck on 33% AGAIN even though i already reinstalled after the first time this  happend.... do i need 2 reinstall every single time i want to play? :/ (its stuck on 33% and it says "Calculating differences| (number of files) files scanned" those numbers NEVER stop scanning, i reached 200k files over a night trying to install league.

To be honest, 200k files scanned is fairly extreme, given that a standard League of Legends installation only has 10-20k files found in the installation directory. Because of this, this honestly sounds like some type of corruption. To that end, have you tried completing all of the steps found in our [Patching Issues Article?](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)  It should help to prevent issues like this!

haha... i saw a notification now, 11 months after the comment. i had a crappy pc, got a way better one now and it works fine.

Sorry for the late response! ;)
I go to open the league client and get a "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" and league was working fine until this new patch was to be released

This is likely because the new patch version of League does not have the proper permissions, so Windows or your Firewall are preemptively blocking the program. You can usually get around this by [Running as an Administrator](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434#wq4) and making sure your [Firewall is allowing the League Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3).

Let me know if those steps don't resolve your issues!
I just solved the issue by creating an exception for the LoL patcher in my Norton Antivirus.  I'm now patching at 200-300 kbps.  Still far slower than usual but at least it's reasonable.
I just get stuck at reading files till about 550 files, then it starts patching but is going at 7KBps a second, which is super slow.
Ive been at 1% for the past 30 mins…is this patch just that big or should i reset it?

Patcher downloading only between 0 and 11 kbps, mostly stays at 0 kbps and doesn't move. In fact it hasn't moved past 0% at all in 30 minutes. It's not an internet issue. Never downloaded anything this slow in my life. Just downloaded another full game in 11 minutes. It's not a security program issue. I ran it as administrator and all security programs are off.

Never had a problem patching before. Usually takes like 30 seconds.
logging onto chat services takes a long time and after login it takes so long to load all the images and i got connection error timed out

Hey superred14!

Try running through some of the solutions in the [troubleshooting connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article!
Like that has ever solved anyones problems.
